sentences.sContent: The statement of the last witness controvert the evidence of the first two.
sentences.sContent_eng: The statement of the last witness controvert the evidence of the first two.
sentences.sCn: 最后一个证人的陈述反驳了前两人的证词。

remMethod.val: contro(反) + vert(转) → 反转 → 反驳， 驳斥

trans.tranOther: to deny, refute, or oppose (some argument or opinion)
